summary: A group of actors are assembled in a small island to film a low-budget movie. Soon, they begin to fall prey to a mysterious killer who uses the lyrics of a weird song to determine his method of murder.
cast: Marie-Alise Recasner|Rick Dean|Ron Gardner|Terence Goodman|Richard Helm|Jeanine Marie|Jared McVay|G. Rockett Phillips|Jim Piper|Michael Stroka|Bari Suber|Steven Tash|Jimmy Williams
director: Director: William T. Naud (as Bill Naud)
title: Sentenciados
